Armenia: Arrival of Hovsep Emin in Armenia
Brazil: Jesuits are expelled from Brazil by the Marquis of Pombal. Indians left without protection.
Canada: A three-month British siege of Quebec City culminates in the pivotal Battle of the Plains of Abraham just outside the city's walls. Both the British and French commanders are killed in the battle. Following a decisive British victory, the French evacuate the city.
Chile: Cuncos and Huilliches defeat a Spanish expedition aiming to build a fort on Bueno River.
India:
French India (to 1954)
Maratha Empire supported by Sikh Sukerchakia Misl defeats Durrani Empire in the Battle of Lahore (1759)
Philippine: Miguel Lino de Ezpeleta appointed Governor-General (1759â€“1761).
